DOC.brief_title: Success Rate Immediately Loaded Implants With Platform Switched Design Placed Anterior Part Mandible Restored With Fixed Prostheses
DOC.criteria: age 18 80 male female ( female nonpregnant ) sufficient oral hygiene inflammation/disorder area implant site edentulous mandible sufficient prosthetic conservative sufficient width height bone place implant diameters 4.8mm length 11 mm provide write informed consent demonstrate need presurgical bone soft tissue augmentation plan implant area exhibit angulation requirement restoration exceed 15 degree systemic metabolic disorder would compromise postoperative tissue regeneration osseointegration take medication would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration bone disorder osteoporosis , hyperparathyroidism , Paget 's disease , diabetes mellitus oncology treatment oral infection acute gingivitis and/or periodontitis local bone defect area plan implantation disorder oral mucosa ( e.g. , leukoplakia , oral lichen , pemphigoid lesion ) receive investigational drug within 30 day history illicit drug alcohol abuse history addiction medication allergic dental material nicotine abuse ( > 20 cigarettes/day ) pregnant nurse clinical significant unstable medical physiological condition would compromise participation study unable unwilling return followup visit period 24 month
